Sabbath-school worker, which will you meet, the standard of Christ or that of the world? Oh, will you say, \93I will lift the cross and follow Jesus?\94 Will you not cultivate His tenderness in persuasion, His earnestness in exhortation, and exemplify 
46
the exalted principles of the truth, manifesting in life and character what the religion of Christ has done for you? Shall we not all heed the exhortation of the apostle, \93Put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof\94?
